intro: Erechtites sonchoides, commonly known as the common blueweed, is a flowering plant native to North America. It belongs to the family Asteraceae, which includes daisies and sunflowers, and is characterized by its composite flower heads. Erechtites sonchoides is often considered a weed due to its aggressive growth and ability to spread rapidly.
